document_data.name: Blood Tide
document_data.mainbody: The '''Blood Tide''' were a group of slavers operating on the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]]. They were subsidiaries of the [[Night Masks]] of [[Westgate]]. As of [[1359 DR]] they were known for using [[gargoyle]]s in their attacks and were in the service of [[Iakhovas|The Taker]] in his campaign for dominance of the sea.
